name: Dan Cooper
overview: Published by CP Verlag, "Game On" was a German disk magazine for C64, available at newspaper stands around Germany at the time. In addition to articles and alike, each number shipped with some games. One of the three games on that number in Game On 1989/04, Dan Cooper, likely named after a man calling himself Dan Cooper managed to hijack a plane without getting caught by parachuting out to the woods, is a straight-up shoot 'em up where you fly a plane and.. well, scroll to the right and shoot stuff.
